channel.title: Real Milonga on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Real Milonga on Simba Tango

item.title: The real stuff
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ oed Ah -- you dance **real** milonga (echte Milonga). After struggling with my milonga for years, this was the ultimate sign I was finally getting somewhere. And one of my favorite compliments ever. I got a tip from the Argentine host to ask this woman to dance, he thought I should dance with someone good. So I did. And was not disappointed. Starting almost right out with a milonga, which would have terrified me only a year earlier.
